#Summary This is the projected Release Plan for the project.

= Introduction =

The projected release plan for the Code Camp Server is as follows:

= Details =
Version 1 - Release Candidate
  * Supports the functionality of Version 1

Version 1 (Will release with the ASP.Net 1.0 Release)
  * Supports a single Admin user
  * Supports a single Code Camp / Conference
  * Supports Multiple Tracks, Timeslots,Sessions, and Speakers
  * Supports Attendee signup and Attendee listing.

Version 2
  * Supports multiple conferences
  * Supports multiple users with the ability to own multiple conferences.
  * Supports an organization that groups users together with their conferences.
